panels.content:
![logo image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/mbon-dashboard-server/client-fknms/static_files/home_dash_logo.png)



Select a specific location using the "Locations" dropdown menu at left.

The range of the displayed time period can be adjusted at top right.

Locations of extracted data:
* STET: Stetson Bank
* BIS: Offshore Biscayne Bay
* UK: Upper Keys
* M/UK: Middle/Upper Keys
* MK: Middle Keys
* LK: Lower Keys
* MQ: Marquesas
* DT: Dry Tortugas
* WFS: West Florida Shelf
* SR: Shark River
* WFB: West Florida Bay
* EFB: East Florida Bay (SST only)
panels.title: General Information

panels.description:
MODIS-Aqua 1km chlor_a product (mg/m^3) binned to 7-day intervals.
Anomaly images created by subtracting 7-day climatologies made using data from 2003-2019.
panels.title: MODIS-Aqua CHLa 7-Day anomaly images (mg/m^3)
MODIS-Aqua remote sensing reflectance at 667nm 7-Day anomaly images (sr^-1)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_chlor_a"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_sst4"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_Rrs_667"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "moda_ABI"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS mean FROM "river_discharge"
WHERE ("location" = 'FKdb') AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: USGS River Discharge from rivers draining to Everglades (sum of discharge from green dots on map - m^3/sec)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS mean FROM "river_discharge"
WHERE ("location" = 'FWCdb_EFL') AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: USGS Gage Height from Tamiami Canal draining into Biscayne Bay (red circle on map - meters)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS mean FROM "river_discharge"
WHERE ("location" = 'FWCdb_STL') AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: USGS Gage Height from the St Lucie River (white circle on map - meters)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "bouy_sal"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Bouys$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: In-situ salinity (psu) at ~1m depth from selected buoy(s)

targets.query:
SELECT mean(/^$metric$/) AS anomaly FROM "bouy_temp"
WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Bouys$/) AND anomaly!=-999 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval),"location" fill(null)

panels.title: In-situ temperature at ~1m depth (psu) from selected buoy(s)

panels.content:
* Satellite data is from the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS-Aqua) sensor and is obtained from the [Ocean Biology Processing Group](https://oceancolor.gsfc.nasa.gov/) at NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center.

* Algal Bloom Index (ABI) is calculated using the method of Hu and Feng (2016; doi: 10.1117/1.JRS.11.012003) 

* River discharge data is obtained from the [USGS National Water Information System](https://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis). Discharge values from the Colorado, Brazos, Trinity, Neches and Sabine Rivers (green circles on map above) are summed for discharge into the northwest Gulf of Mexico and plotted above. Discharge data from the Mississippi River (yellow circle on map above) is also plotted.

Please feel free to contact us with questions or to sign up for email alerts:

Dr. Daniel Otis - [dotis@usf.edu](mailto:dotis@usf.edu)
panels.title: Data Sources and Contact Information

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM moda_ABI WITH KEY=location
list.label: Satellite Time Series Extraction Locations
list.name: Locations
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM moda_ABI WITH KEY=location

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM bouy_temp WITH KEY=location
list.label: Bouy Locations
